name: SynastriaLoot
description: Displays a list of items available in the one that are not attuned

name: Scoots' Stats
description: This adds a stat panel to the right of your character panel

name: Attune Helper
description: (Requires SynastriaCoreLib) QT's AttuneHelper Addon: Auto-equips attuneable gear and more

name: Qt's Auto-Roller
description: Automatically rolls for loot while in a group

name: Scoots' Craft
description: A complete overhaul of the profession UI, tailored to Synastria

name: ArkInventory (Attunements)
description: This is a modified ArkInventory that adds support for attunements.

name: Scoots' Confirmation Skip
description: Skips confirmation dialogue for equipping BoE and looting BoP items.

name: Scoots' Quick Auction
description: Rapidly create auctions at a specified price.

name: Scoots' Rares
description: Creates a chat link to automatically run .findnpc command when near a rare.

name: Scoots' Speedrun
description: Instantly selects dialogue choices in dungeons.

name: Scoots' Vendor Forge
description: Replaces the previous token addon and adds options to continuuosly purchase until forged.

name: Scoots' Vendor Filter
description: Converts vendor panels from paginated icons into a scrollable list.
